Package com.frc5113.library.motors

Class SmartNeo

java.lang.Object
com.revrobotics.CANSparkMaxLowLevel
com.revrobotics.CANSparkMax
com.frc5113.library.motors.SmartNeo
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.motorcontrol.MotorController, AutoCloseable
public class SmartNeo extends com.revrobotics.CANSparkMax
Modifications to CANSparkMax-esq brushless motors (commonly the Neo)
  • Auto-wrenching default talon configs
  • Chainable configuration
  • Readability / usability improvements
